original_title: Gov't Mule - A Tail Of Two Cities
overview: A Tail of Two Cities features complete shows from the last night of their Deja Voodoo Tour on October 15th, 2004 at The Orpheum Theatre in Boston and their first night of the High & Might tour at the Riviera Theatre in Chicago on December 9th, 2006.
title: Gov't Mule - A Tail Of Two Cities
